page.title: 15HANWOOD PRIMARY SCHOOL HEAD
page.content:
The present headmaster has been head of Hanwood Primary School since it was built 16 years ago. The current building was built to amalgamate the village schools of Lea Cross, Cruckmeole and Hanwood.The Headmaster stated his main aim for the education of the children in his school is:"{To {help them to understand the world in {which they live and develop their {personality and skills to the full."
The Headmaster of Hanwood Primary School is responsible to The Shropshire Education Committee and the school Governors.The Head stated that the most difficult part of being a Headteacher is providing all the necessary equipment and books on a limited amount of money.
